description: Swap in this ladderlock buckle to replace broken buckles in the field using only a screwdriver. The strong stainless steel pin means the buckle can be used as a permanent replacement, with no need to re-sew any webbing loops after you get home.Stainless steel pins are strong and corrosion-resistant.Can be replaced in the field using a screwdriver.Serves as a permanent fix.Available in 15mm, 20mm and 25mm widths.
name: Sea To Summit Field Repair Buckle Ladderlock - 1 Pin
